lexUnit.name: bad.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: offending moral standards or accepted conventions

sentence.text: But a system which institutionalises bad behaviour has something deeply wrong with it .
In established States , less serious forms of bad behaviour are also permitted .
He knew all too well what to expect : several hours of bad behaviour from the children -- over-excited and freed from the constraints of routine -- and importunate conversation from the parents .
A SHERIFF yesterday reported a solicitor to the Law Society of Scotland for what he said was the worst courtroom behaviour he had seen in 40 years .
They were all thieves and bad girls .
And although it may be bad for a girl of that age to have sex , I can honestly say that it does not appear to have caused me any lasting harm , either emotionally or physically .
And you are a bad girl , are n't you , Lais ? "
Ahmed had come from that dizzy town to boast that he had seen a bad strange girl leaving Marie Claire 's house and had shouted and thrown stones at her .
She is a bad girl . "
Asked by Ruth Anderson , for the uncle , if she was absolutely sure he had done bad things to her twice , the girl replied : ` I ca n't remember because I was only little . "
But Mitchell wo n't condone the taking of life and soon it seems both good guys and bad guys want him out of the way .
If you meet a bad guy , you lock him up .
He said : ` I was made out to be the bad guy .
` The boys simply used bad language , and we did something about it . "
` There are a number of bishops in public life who attack bad language .
We trimmed the majority of the bad language and some of the excesses of violence as well .
You see , Toscanini was not a bad man ; he was so musically dedicated and disciplined himself that he simply could n't understand that some people can play a false note or play out of time .
THE film made me laugh and I really loved it when Kevin set the traps for the two bad men .
But even if he did n't get the sack , folk would likely look at him different , as if he were a bad man .
It 's not bad to succeed , to excel , and it 's always satisfying to solve a difficulty .
` It 's clearly bad to construct a golf course somewhere where there is an existing habitat , or grassland .
` School tries to teach that it 's bad to fight .
There are some folk who think that they are too bad to be saved , there are other folk who do n't think they 're bad enough to need saving , both are equally wrong !
